title: paloalto_query
description: Query a Palo Alto firewall via SSH. Executes one or more read-only commands and returns structured results. All operations are read-only - enforcement is at the device account level. Credentials are read from environment variables (PALOALTO_USERNAME, PALOALTO_PASSWORD).

commands.description: List of PAN-OS CLI commands to execute (1-10 commands)
